channel.title: technology on nithitsuki's website
channel.description: Recent content in technology on nithitsuki's website

item.title: Tips on creating remarkable (tech) projects
item.description: When it comes to creating Tech projects, most are created with one of these 2 reasons in mind: Out of Passion Out of necessity (school/for your resume/work) Though I have (as of writing) always started projects out of passion, I have also been interested in making them more useful to me by enhancing my portfolio (resume) or by creating a more marketable product
